channel.title: Detection search on Security365 Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Detection search on Security365 Docs

item.title: Available parameters
item.description: Available parametersYou can pull information for a message in search detections using the following parameters: From (envelope_from) From Name To (any) (envelope_to) To Name (any) Cc (any) ReplyTo Subject (any) Sent DateTime (formatted as YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS) Received DateTime (formatted as YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS) final_disposition alert_id sha256 (attachments) ssdeep (attachments) name (attachments) md5 (attachments) Message-ID smtp_helo_server_ip smtp_previous_hop_ip x_originating_ip Reason(s) for Detection ​â€‹ Data retention For Area 1 Horizon Enterprise customers, detections search would index for a period of 12 months and rotate over to a rolling 12-month period.
